docs.text: Class: ChromosomeLocation A Location on a chromosome defined by a species and chromosome name. MUST be unique within document. . type NONE 1..1 MUST be "ChromosomeLocation" . species_id CURIE 1..1 CURIE representing a species from the NCBI species taxonomy . Default: "taxonomy:9606" (human) . chr NONE 1..1 The symbolic chromosome name. For humans, For humans, chromosome names MUST be one of 1..22, X, Y (case-sensitive) . interval CytobandInterval 1..1 The chromosome region defined by a CytobandInterval . docs.text: Class: CytobandInterval A contiguous span on a chromosome defined by cytoband features. URI: GA4GHVRSDefinitions:CytobandInterval Slots Name Range Cardinality Description Info type NONE 1..1 MUST be "CytobandInterval" . start HumanCytoband 1..1 The start cytoband region. MUST specify a region nearer the terminal end (telomere) of the chromosome p-arm than end . . end HumanCytoband 1..1 The start cytoband region. MUST specify a region nearer the terminal end (telomere) of the chromosome q-arm than start . . docs.text: Class: SequenceInterval A SequenceInterval represents a span on a Sequence. Positions are always represented by contiguous spans using interbase coordinates or coordinate ranges. The minimum value of this coordinate or range is 0. MUST represent a coordinate or range greater than the value of start . .
